onboard_file_upload.name: Reddam Charan Teja
onboard_file_upload.profile_summary: Motivated engineering student with hands-on experience in developing scalable backend services, REST APIs, and secure authentication flows. Strong foundation in Data Structures, Databases, and Object-Oriented Programming. Eager to learn quickly, contribute to feature development, and improve backend functionality in fast-paced engineering teams.
education: Prasad V. Potluri Siddhartha Institute Of Technology, B. Tech in Computer Science Engineering (Data Science) — CGPA: 8.1, 2023 – 2027, Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh
certificationsAndAchievementsAndAwards: SmartInterviews: Ranked in the Top 300 on the DSA upskilling platform
Smart India Hackathon (SIH): Led the team and qualified for the internal hackathon round with the Samudra Sahayak project
Led and contributed to multiple hackathons with focus on rapid prototyping and delivery
Active participant in coding contests on LeetCode, CodeChef, and external programming competitions
projects: Samudra Sahayak|Real-Time Hazard Reporting Platform (In Development) –Built a real-time alerting backend using FastAPI and Socket.IO for low-latency communication between field responders and dashboards. –Designed and secured role-based APIs with geospatial filters using MongoDB, enabling granular access across jurisdictions. –Developed cross-platform UI in Flutter and React powered by RESTful endpoints, reducing delays in reporting and response. –Implemented an offline-first capability, ensuring reliable data sync and submissions in low-connectivity environments.

QuizMaster|Full-Stack Quiz Platform –Built a full-stack quiz platform with FastAPI + MongoDB backend and React frontend, supporting user login, quiz creation, and AI-powered generation. –Developed REST APIs for authentication, quiz management, scoring, and history, with token validation and optimized database updates. –Designed the system to support real-time multiplayer quizzes using WebSockets (Socket.IO) for synchronized questions and live leaderboards.
